sentences.sContent: The two leaders also approved treaties to cut stockpiles of chemical weapons.
sentences.sCn: 两位领导人也都赞同削减化学武器储备的条约。

remMethod.val: stock(储备) + pile(堆) → 成堆地储备 → 大量贮备

trans.tranOther: a large supply of things that is kept ready for use in the future
to keep adding to a supply of goods, weapons etc that you are keeping ready to use if you need them in the future
